description:
Guitar: Fixed some more bends!
Vocals: Fixed Lyrics!
Added a subtle detail at the end of Chorus 2a & Chorus 3a that Serj does
And made some improvements
Drums: More accurate Cymbals
Marked Cymbal mutes with Staccato signs
Added some subtle Ghost Snares during the Choruses
Added text to indicate double hits/flams (at the end of Choruses)
Added some subtle Kicks in the Outro
Corrected the Outro ending Drumroll
Tambourine track: Added Shaker!
title: BYOB

reports.summary: Both this revision and the previous one introduces new mistakes and are generally hard to read. Please revert to the latest one from SiphonicSugar.

description:
Added back the obvious Pull-Offs, fixed Bends, Added more Slides, Corrected the Guitar riff in the Band Intro, Fixed the Bridge riff
Added back the Bass Slides
Fixed the BPM of the Chorus
Arranged Instruments in Order of Appearence
Edited some Lyrics at the Bridge
The Verses could be in 4/4 or 6/8, Daron, Serj and Shavo feel it in 4/4 but John plays it in 6/8 specially the Hi-Hat
Added back the Note Names and Chords, they still help!
title: BYOB

description:
Updated some stuff.

When you slow it down, you can hear the sound of the pick on every note in the intro. It doesn't seem like he does pull-offs until the bass and drums come in.
title: BYOB

reports.summary: This tab and the last one leaves instruments empty, removes a lot of details, removes lyrics, some bars have BPMs that are too fast, removes Chord names, a lot of Pull-offs are missing, some Bends are broken, the Bridge Guitar riff is incorrect, removes Slides from Bass, the revision comment on the last tab is offensive, this user is reuploding a previously reverted tab.

description:
Yeah, fuck off.

Don't revert the damn tab. I swear the one I'm uploading is an improvement. Better notation all around.

Yes, vocals still need to be added, and maybe some drum stuff can be updated.

But don't revert it back to the previous trash ass tab.
title: BYOB

reports.summary: It leaves instruments empty, It removes a lot of details, a lot of Pull-offs are missing, some Bends are broken, the Bridge Guitar riff is incorrect, removes Slides from Bass, the revision comment is offensive.

description: Made Vocals louder

description:
Edited BPM
Added Note Names and Chords
Serj's high C# now plays and adjusted some Notes
Daron Harmonizes during the Chorus, the other times he's yelling, only in the Live versions he acompanies Serj, edited the Interlude a bit
Added some Slides to Guitar and Bass
The Interlude Guitar Riff now has corrected Slides
title: BYOB

description: Corrected Serj's Vocal Harmonies during the Verses and edited Daron's Vocals at the  Intro and Interlude
title: BYOB

description:
New Section names, changed Time Signature before the Prechorus.
Edited Guitar, added some Pull Offs and Slides, new Bends and Pinch Harmonics at the Chorus; Chords, Slides and Hammer Ons at the Interlude.
Edited Bass at the Prechorus and Chorus, new rhythm at the Interlude and Bridges.
Edited Drums, added more varied cymbals.
Added new Vocals track that mimics the high vocals at the Chorus, a tambourine track too, some of Daron's vocals where actually Serj's double tracked so shifted them to that, added lyrics and edited some of Serj's notes.
title: BYOB
